tool_description: An API for interacting with https://granblue.team
name: granblue.tools
title: granblue.tools

api_list.name: /version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://granblue-tools.p.rapidapi.com/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "granblue-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://granblue-tools.p.rapidapi.com/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "granblue-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
